  BEERS & COCKTAILS  

Our Beer

We have beers duh!

Hazy IPA

  • 5.8% ABV
  • Full body
  • Citrus flavors
  • Citra & Mosaic hops
 

Blueberry Wheat

  • 5% ABV
  • Light body
  • Super easy drinker
  • Hints of blueberry
 

Black Lager

  • 5% ABV
  • Light body
  • Roasted flavors
  • Easy drinker
 

Kettle Sour

  • 4.8% ABV
  • Light body
  • Tart flavor
 

Chocolate Porter

  • 5.5% ABV
  • Lighter body
  • Coffee notes
  • Maleku cacao nibs
 

WC IPA

  • 6.3% ABV
  • Medium body
  • Classic WC flavor
  • Simcoe & Amarillo hops
 

Stout

  • 8.5% ABV
  • Heavy body
  • Roasted coffee
  • Chocolate notes
 

Lager

  • 4.8% ABV
  • Lighty body
  • Crisp
  • Easy all day drinker
 

Sandia Sour

  • 4.8% ABV
  • Very light and crisp
  • Salted watermelon
  • Sour hibiscus
 

New England IPA

  • 7.2% ABV
  • Heavier body
  • Citrus flavors
  • Mosaic & Citra hops
 

Session

  • 3.8% ABV
  • Very light body
  • Crisp
  • Citra hops
 

DDH Triple

  • 9.5% ABV
  • Medium body
  • Heavier IBUs
  • Galaxy & El Dorado hops
